snippet.title: CastleDay 2.0 (Legacy Development)
snippet.description:
***** THIS VIDEO IS A LEGACY DEVELOPMENT CYCLE *****
CastleDay's Warhill was renamed to CastleDay and is no longer in active development.

CastleDay's WarHill is a new indie game in open development. As a team of two indie developers we are combining several genres together to create a unique multiplayer experience.

1- The game begins with a free-for-all scramble to gather energy by attacking monsters or other players. 

2- Monsters will drop Power Orbs which Level Up your abilities when collected.

3- First player with a full bar of energy TRANSFORMS in to a CastleDay Royal. Every second earns Royalty Points to secure victory.

4- All players rally together to destroy your crystals. Lose two and the CastleDay Family will be expelled from your body.

-------  Indie Game Developers ------

Christen Main
@gamedevbeauty
Twitter: http://twitter.com/gamedevbeauty
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/gamedevbeauty
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/christenmain
Twitch: http://twitch.com/gamedevbeauty
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCiHoXe8EFTexAThsQk5N7kw

Christopher Main
@themainstark
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/themainstark
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/themainstark
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/christophermain
Twitch: http://www.twitch.com/themainstark
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC2eGL98FfPF6SC7l-LWZezw

Stark Gaming Inc.
Twitter: http://twitter.com/starkgaminginc
Instagram: http://instagram.com/starkgaminginc
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/stark-gaming-incorporated/
Twitch: http://twitch.com/starkgaminginc
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC3hD70G6p4w1HKZWsSMFH7g
Facebook: http://facebook.com/starkgaminginc

------ Technology ------

Unreal Engine 4 - Blueprint Programming
PlayFab - Scalable Cloud Based Live Operations Solution

------ Where it started (History) ------

CastleDay's WarHill started during the 2018 Unreal Engine 4 Spring Game Jam (May 10th-15th). The husband-wife team, Christopher "TheMainStark" Main and Christen "gameDEVbeauty" Main, pushed themselves to the max and sought out to create a multiplayer online game in that 5 day period. They were successful in creating a literal take on King of the Hill. In this version players would race to capture the crown at the top of the mountain. First player to capture the crown would transform in to CastleDay Royalty. From here all players rallied to push the King or Queen off the mountain.

Game Jam Highlight Trailer:
https://youtu.be/yZupMWRj4BM

------ Misc. Info ------

Song:
Track: NIVIRO - Memes [NCS Release]
Music provided by NoCopyrightSounds.
Watch: https://youtu.be/hgXZQfHySDw
Free Download / Stream: http://ncs.io/MemesYO

Future Live Streaming Channels (not active yet):
http://twitch.tv/themainstark
http://twitch.tv/starkgaminginc
